cause.description:
Pakistan......a country already fraught with inhumanities.......its about time we stood up against the abusers of women and children in any way whatsoever......women & children are the anchors in our families and the dreams of our future. We need solidarity, ONE voice to bring the perpatrators to hook.
1. No more humilation of women in villages by Village Elders(panchayat) and no more child labour
cause.mission: Eradicate all abuses against women & children in paksitan
cause.name: Curb abuses over women & children
